subject: Character Demo - "Hu Tao: Let the Living Beware" | Genshin Impact
content:
When the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor is performing important rites, we appreciate it if people keep a respectful distance away from the proceedings.


...But if you insist on gatecrashing a funeral... Well, I'm sure we can squeeze you in somewhere...

subject: Developers' Discussion - 03/02 — Q&A hot off the press!
content:
​


Hey, Travelers! Another sizzling Developers' Discussion is here! (*^▽^*) Come and take a look!



Q1: I wonder if we'll get to see the Condensed Resin cap increased to four in this lifetime.

A1: In Version 1.4, the maximum amount of Condensed Resin that you can have at once will be increased! We will discuss this in detail during the Version 1.4 Sneak Peek Livestream.



Q2: I have Condensed Resin in my inventory, but when I try to enter a Domain, the game still tells me that I have insufficient Resin.

A2: Resin notifications have been improved in Version 1.4. If you have Condensed Resin in your inventory when entering a Domain, you will no longer receive a notification about having insufficient Resin.



Q3: What's the current maximum Adventure Rank?

A3: In Version 1.3, the maximum Adventure Rank is 60. In Version 1.4, excess Adventure EXP gained after hitting Adventure Rank 60 will be converted into Mora.



Q4: I increased my World Level to continue leveling my Adventure Rank and I regret it. How can I decrease my World Level?

A4: We have already created a solution! We will explain our plan for adjustments to all Travelers during the Version 1.4 Sneak Peek Livestream.



Q5: Can you improve the weapon upgrade system? It took me almost 20 minutes to get my weapon to level 40...

A5: To give Travelers a more convenient gaming experience, we will continue to optimize the weapon upgrade system in future version updates, such as increasing the number of slots for weapon upgrade materials.



Q6: I can't use the Crafting Bench in Co-Op Mode. It's very inconvenient.

A6: Improving the Crafting Bench has consistently been a hot topic of feedback from Travelers. We have also been continuously tweaking and optimizing its features. One such feature is the ability to use the Crafting Bench while playing with friends. We will make the Crafting Bench more convenient for Travelers to use in future versions. Please give the dev team some more time! >_<



Q7: I really want to save all my birthday mail!

A7: We strongly understand Travelers' desire to save mail from their companions, so a mail favorites system is in the works~



Q8: Let's get a re-challenge button in the Spiral Abyss!

A8: We hear you, Travelers! We have made improvements to the Spiral Abyss in Version 1.4. These will be thoroughly explained during the Sneak Peek Livestream, so Travelers should remember to tune in!



Q9: I want to locate my Co-Op teammates faster.

A9: The ability to quickly locate your teammates is already on our to-do list. We will keep striving to improve Travelers' Co-Op Mode experience~ (You can do it, dev team!)



Q10: After Xiao uses his Elemental Burst, does his Elemental Skill still generate Elemental Particles?

A10: After Xiao activates "Bane of All Evil," using "Lemniscatic Wind Cycling" on enemies will not generate Elemental Particles so long as he dons his yaksha mask. It should generate Elemental Particles under any other circumstances.

This situation is similar to Razor's, in which his Elemental Skill "Claw and Thunder" will not generate Elemental Particles while his Elemental Burst is active.

This situation is similar to Razor's, in which his Elemental Skill "Claw and Thunder" will not generate Elemental Particles while his Elemental Burst is active.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Hu Tao: Fragrance in Thaw" | Genshin Impact
content:
Life leads unto death, and death unto new life — why, then, should death be taboo?


The precocious Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Hu Tao, has long since known this to be true.
contentOriginal:
Life leads unto death, and death unto new life — why, then, should death be taboo?


The precocious Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Hu Tao, has long since known this to be true.

subject: Character Shorts - Qiqi
content:
Hi Travelers~


Paimon ran into a bunch of finches on the road today. They all had different colors — so cute! But it sounded like they were arguing about something... So Paimon went over to find out what was going on~


Hehe, so apparently, each of them thought THEY were Qiqi's best friend!


Because Qiqi has a poor memory, she records important things in her notebook. She forgot to write the color of the finches she played with down, so she thought she was playing with the same finch each time!

Because Qiqi has a poor memory, she records important things in her notebook. She forgot to write the color of the finches she played with down, so she thought she was playing with the same finch each time!

subject: "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" - Complete Expeditions to Receive Primogems!
content:
​



During the event, Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild will post investigative expeditions for "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" every day. Once completed, you will be rewarded with Primogems. Depending on the characters dispatched, you may also earn additional rewards such as Mora, Hero's Wit, and Mystic Enhancement Ore. Progressing through the investigative expeditions will gradually unlock "On the Hunt." Complete these hunt challenges to obtain their corresponding rewards! 



〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration： 2021/03/05 04:00:00 – 2021/03/12 03:59:59

Reward Collection Time： 2021/03/05 04:00:00 – 2021/03/15 03:59:59 



〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above Complete Liyue Katheryne's quest "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" 



〓Event Details〓

● During this event, Katheryne will release eight investigative expeditions for "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" every day, of which Travelers can choose four.

● There are a limited number of commissions per rank. One S-rank commission, two A-rank commissions, and five B-rank commissions will refresh each day.

● For each expedition, Travelers may enlist one character belonging to a friend as support. Supporting characters will increase the chance of obtaining additional rewards. Any character in a friend's Character Showcase may be selected as support.

● Characters cannot be simultaneously dispatched to both regular expeditions and "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" event expeditions.


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" Gameplay Details
content:
The Adventurers' Guild has collected much information on the dangerous Geovishaps in recent days. Katheryne of Liyue Harbor is currently commissioning adventurers to investigate further.


Complete expeditions to earn Primogem rewards. Depending on which characters you dispatch, you can also earn bonus rewards including Mora, Hero's Wit, and Mystic Enhancement Ore.



〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration: 2021/03/05 04:00 – 2021/03/12 03:59 (Server time)

Reward Collection Time: 2021/03/05 04:00 – 2021/03/15 03:59 (Server time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

Complete Liyue Katheryne's quest "Vishaps and Where to Find Them"


〓Event Guidelines〓



During this event, Katheryne will release eight investigative expeditions (one S-rank, two A-rank, and five B-rank) for "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" every day, of which Travelers can choose four. The amount of time required to complete the expeditions is different for each expedition rank.


Complete these expeditions from Katheryne to win Primogems.

​


Travelers must dispatch at least two of their own characters on each expedition. Additionally, Travelers

may enlist one character belonging to a friend as support. Supporting characters will increase the chance

of obtaining additional rewards. Any character in a friend's Character Showcase may be selected as support.




Tip: Characters cannot be simultaneously dispatched to both regular expeditions and "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" event expeditions.


During the event, "On the Hunt" challenges will also become available.


In the bottom-left corner of the "Vishaps and Where to Find Them" expeditions page, you will find the entry to the "On the Hunt" page, from which you can proceed to the Bounty. A marker will then appear on your map indicating the location of the Geovishaps. Go to the location and solve the puzzle to find the Geovishaps; defeat them to earn the corresponding rewards.

subject: 1.4 Special Program Announcement
content:
Dear Travelers,


Today Paimon brings you great news! The Special Program for "Genshin Impact" version 1.4 will be officially released on March 6 at 11:00 (UTC-5)!


During the special program, you will discover all the juicy details of version 1.4. In addition to that, you can get redemption codes and other incredible gifts that we prepared especially for you. Do not miss out!

The Special Program will be hosted on our official YouTube channel >>>

https://youtu.be/iPt7z1rRptI


Paimon will see you all there!

subject: Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
Songs of joy in the winds are streaming,


Beneath the flowers old hymns abide;


Though you should seek the festivity's meaning,


Forget not that which your hearts do hide.

subject: The PlayStation®4 Version of "Slime Paradise" is Opening Soon
content:
Dear Travelers,


We've received various feedback from Travelers regarding the recent "Slime Paradise" web event.


We will continue to strive to provide an ever-better game and event experience to Travelers. Your feedback is a valuable part of our work in such improvement and optimization.


The PlayStation®4 version of "Slime Paradise" is opening soon! Thank you to all Travelers on PlayStation®4 for your patience.


Event Start Time

2021/3/25 13:00 (UTC+8)


Event Platform

PlayStation®4


Thank you, Travelers, for supporting Genshin Impact! We pay careful attention to the feedback of our Travelers on PlayStation and strive to make the game experience the same quality across PlayStation®4, PC, iOS, and Android. Unfortunately, certain technical issues have prevented PlayStation®4 Travelers from enjoying the optimal experience of event participation and features. We sincerely apologize for this, and will increase our speed of development as we strive to bring Travelers across all platforms a consistent, complete game experience.



Slime Paradise

PlayStation®4 Version


2021/3/25 – 2021/4/3

Opens 2021/3/25 13:00 (UTC+8)

subject: Character Teaser - "Venti: The Four Winds" (English Voice-Over) | Genshin Impact
content:
This tale began a thousand years ago, when Mondstadt's rulers fell from grace. The southern lion their crowns to the earth did throw, and the west wind arose and took their place.


The guardian of the north returned, and near to the wolven wood he drew. The four winds blew each in their turn, and united they built Mondstadt anew.
contentOriginal:
This tale began a thousand years ago, when Mondstadt's rulers fell from grace. The southern lion their crowns to the earth did throw, and the west wind arose and took their place.


The guardian of the north returned, and near to the wolven wood he drew. The four winds blew each in their turn, and united they built Mondstadt anew.

subject: Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume": New System
content:
As the version update draws near, Travelers must certinly be growing curious as to what the new version may hold. So today, let's have a look at a new system that will be coming in this update — Hangout Events.


In Hangout Events, Travelers can spend some special time with characters on their Story Quests, which each have multiple endings to discover.
contentOriginal:

In Hangout Events, Travelers can spend some special time with characters on their Story Quests, which each have multiple endings to discover.

subject: The preview page for Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" is now open!
content:
Wind and flowers, wine and poetry, freedom and love — Mondstadt's annual Windblume Festival is almost here!



>>Go to V1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" Preview Page<<



With popular 5-star characters returning, the new 4-star character Rosaria (Cryo), the 5-star weapon Elegy for the End, and the Windblume Festival themed event, Version 1.4 is packed with new content to enjoy — be the first to learn about it all!


※ You can get 10,000 Mora by visiting the event website and sharing the page

※ You can get 10,000 Mora by visiting the event website and sharing the page

subject: Pre-Installation Function Coming Soon
content:
〓How to Update〓


PC:

After the pre-installation function is available, you must first update the Genshin Impact Launcher. After updating the launcher, a "Game Pre-Installation" button will appear to the left of the "Launch" button. Click "Game Pre-Installation" to download the latest game resources.

​


After completing pre-installation, when the version update is released, open the launcher again and click "Update" to install the game directly without any further need to download game resources.

If pre-installation is not complete, when you reopen the launcher and click "Update," game resources will continue downloading from the point where pre-installation progress ended.


Mobile (iOS & Android)

Method 1: Travelers may begin pre-installing update resources by going to the Paimon Menu > Settings > Other > Pre-Install Resource Package.



Method 2: Travelers may also begin pre-installing update resources by tapping the "Pre-Install Resource Package" icon on the bottom left corner of the login menu.



When the version update is released, Travelers on iOS devices must enter the App Store and tap Update. Android users may open the game and follow the directions on-screen (or open Google Play and tap Update).

Using the pre-installation function will reduce the time that the game spends updating resources on the first time you enter Version 1.4, even if you did not fully complete pre-installation.

After the pre-installation function is available, you must first update the Genshin Impact Launcher. After updating the launcher, a "Game Pre-Installation" button will appear to the left of the "Launch" button. Click "Game Pre-Installation" to download the latest game resources.

​


After completing pre-installation, when the version update is released, open the launcher again and click "Update" to install the game directly without any further need to download game resources.

If pre-installation is not complete, when you reopen the launcher and click "Update," game resources will continue downloading from the point where pre-installation progress ended.


Mobile (iOS & Android)

Method 1: Travelers may begin pre-installing update resources by going to the Paimon Menu > Settings > Other > Pre-Install Resource Package.



Method 2: Travelers may also begin pre-installing update resources by tapping the "Pre-Install Resource Package" icon on the bottom left corner of the login menu.



When the version update is released, Travelers on iOS devices must enter the App Store and tap Update. Android users may open the game and follow the directions on-screen (or open Google Play and tap Update).

Using the pre-installation function will reduce the time that the game spends updating resources on the first time you enter Version 1.4, even if you did not fully complete pre-installation.

subject: Event Wish "Ballad in Goblets" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Windborne Bard" Venti (Anemo)!
content:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

  

〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 1.4 update– 2021-04-06 15:59:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Windborne Bard" Venti (Anemo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During the event wish, the 4-star characters "Harmless Sweetie" Sucrose (Anemo), "Wolf Boy" Razor (Electro), and "Chivalric Blossom" Noelle (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!


※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: "Hangout Events: Series I" - Story Quest Overview
content:
Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able use Story Keys to unlock Hangout Events for Barbara, Noelle, Chongyun, and Bennett.


The Hangout Events feature unlocks at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)


〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 1.4 update


〓Series I Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 26 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom

Adventure Rank 26 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom

subject: "Windborne Blossoms" - Event Details
content:
Travelers can earn rich rewards in "Windborne Blossoms" during the event duration. Unlock "Gnostic Hymn" or "Gnostic Chorus" to further earn Intertwined Fate and a designated 4-star weapon! Purchase "Gnostic Chorus" directly to get the exclusive BP namecard "Travel Notes: Windblume."


〓Event Duration〓

After the Version 1.4 update – 2021/04/26 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Details〓

● Sojourner's Battle Pass will be unlocked by default every BP Period. Travelers can also unlock either Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus in order to earn even more rewards, or directly purchase Gnostic Chorus at a discounted price.


※ Travelers who have already unlocked Gnostic Hymn need only exchange the remaining difference in cost in order to unlock Gnostic Chorus."

※ Travelers who have already unlocked Gnostic Hymn need only exchange the remaining difference in cost in order to unlock Gnostic Chorus."

subject: Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume"
content:
As new version approaches, so too do new events — are you ready, Travelers? Scroll down and view the image below for details on upcoming events~


All times below based on server time.

As new version approaches, so too do new events — are you ready, Travelers? Scroll down and view the image below for details on upcoming events~

subject: Character Demo - "Venti: A Bard's Business" (English Voice-Over) | Genshin Impact
content:
Teyvat is a place where people of all sorts go about their business — merchants move product, knights patrol, farmers till the land, and even an enigmatic astrologist must look to hers…


—That said, it seems like bards might be the exception to this rule.
contentOriginal:
Teyvat is a place where people of all sorts go about their business — merchants move product, knights patrol, farmers till the land, and even an enigmatic astrologist must look to hers…


—That said, it seems like bards might be the exception to this rule.

subject: "Invitation of Windblume" - Take Part and Exchange for the Event-Exclusive Bow, Windblume Ode
content:
During the event, Travelers can complete challenges related to the Windblume Festival to obtain Festive Tour Tickets and Peculiar Collab Coupons. Exchange these in the Event Shop for the event-exclusive weapon Windblume Ode (Bow) and its exclusive refinement material "The Visible Winds," as well as the Crown of Insight and more.

 

〓Event Duration〓

2021/03/19 10:00:00 - 2021/04/05 03:59:59

〓Event Shop Duration〓

2021/03/19 10:00:00 - 2021/04/12 03:59:59

 

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"

 

〓Festive Anecdotes〓

A series of Windblume Festival quests will become available during the event period. Four acts of "Festive Anecdotes" will unlock over the course of the event, each bringing new quests. Complete these quests to win rewards including Primogems, Character EXP Materials, and Mora.

 

〓Festive Challenges〓

Travelers can participate in three types of Festive Challenges during the event: Bullseye Balloons, Floral Freefall, and Ballads of Breeze. Complete the challenges to obtain Festive Tour Tickets.

● A new stage will be unlocked for each Festive Challenge during each act. In single player mode, beat certain scores to win prizes off the corresponding characters.

● In Co-Op Mode, you can try to best your friends in Bullseye Balloons and Floral Freefall challenges.

※ Festive Tour Tickets can only be obtained by completing Festive Challenges in single player mode.

 

〓Peculiar Wonderland〓

During the event, complete the quest "Peculiar Wonderland" to unlock the Peculiar Wonderland. After the Windblume Festival begins, more activities will appear in the Peculiar Wonderland as the event progresses, including Peculiar Challenges, Peculiar Trials, and Peculiar Conqueror tasks. Travelers can complete the challenges to obtain Peculiar Collab Coupons.

● Each round of the Peculiar Wonderland is made up of three Peculiar Challenges and one Peculiar Trial. Up to three blessings can be activated according to your performance in the Peculiar Challenges. Travelers can use blessings in the Peculiar Trial to aid them in completing the challenge more quickly.

● Different Peculiar Conqueror tasks will be unlocked when each act opens, and Peculiar Trials will also change. Peculiar Trials of previous acts will no longer appear.

● Complete designated Peculiar Conqueror tasks to obtain Primogems, Character Talent Materials, Mora, and other rewards.

 

〓Event Details〓

● During the event gameplay duration, enhancing Windblume Ode (Bow) yields a Weapon Enhancement EXP Bonus.

● Progress made on Peculiar Conqueror tasks before the tasks themselves are unlocked will not be recorded.

● After successfully completing the Peculiar Wonderland challenge, the corresponding Peculiar Conqueror tasks will be recorded as completed.

※ After 2021/04/12 03:59:59, any remaining Festive Tour Tickets and Peculiar Collab Coupons will automatically disappear. Please make sure to exchange them for rewards in time.

subject: Genshin Impact EP - Songs of Melodious Winds
content:
Under the moon lies a grassy plain, silent save for crickets' harmonious calls.


A village wakens after a light rain, where spring water and windmills perform a pleasant ensemble.


In this land free from worry, a bard's hands on the lyre and voice in the air spread songs unbridled with joy.
contentOriginal:
Under the moon lies a grassy plain, silent save for crickets' harmonious calls.


A village wakens after a light rain, where spring water and windmills perform a pleasant ensemble.


In this land free from worry, a bard's hands on the lyre and voice in the air spread songs unbridled with joy.

subject: On March 19, the version event “Invitation of Windblume” is set to begin!
content:
Hello, Travelers!


Have you all ever heard of the Windblume Festival? It's a Mondstadt tradition — a festival of love and freedom. On March 19, the version event “Invitation of Windblume” is set to begin! What kind of fun content and awesome rewards do we have to look forward to in this event?


Let’s give you a sneak peek right now~ If today’s overview isn’t enough to satisfy your anticipation, tomorrow we will be detailing the event gameplay for “Invitation of Windblume”! Don’t miss out~
contentOriginal:
Hello, Travelers!


Have you all ever heard of the Windblume Festival? It's a Mondstadt tradition — a festival of love and freedom. On March 19, the version event “Invitation of Windblume” is set to begin! What kind of fun content and awesome rewards do we have to look forward to in this event?


Let’s give you a sneak peek right now~ If today’s overview isn’t enough to satisfy your anticipation, tomorrow we will be detailing the event gameplay for “Invitation of Windblume”! Don’t miss out~

subject: "Invitation of Windblume" Gameplay Details
content:
The grand carnival celebration, held in praise of freedom and love!


Traverse Mondstadt's emerald green fields, walk amidst the crowds enjoying the festival, and take a tour filled with poetry and flowers — your Windblume Festival journey begins here.​


The "Invitation of Windblume" event is about to begin! Take part in challenges during the Windblume Festival to obtain Festive Tour Tickets and Peculiar Collab Coupons. Exchange these at the Event Shop for the event-exclusive weapon Windblume Ode and its exclusive refinement material "The Visible Winds," as well as the Crown of Insight and more.



New event-related missions have also been added to "Windborne Blossoms." Complete them to receive BEP.


​


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above,

And complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"


〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration: 2021/03/19 10:00 – 2021/04/05 03:59 (Server Time)

Event Shop Duration: 2021/03/19 10:00 – 2021/04/12 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Event Description〓

"Invitation of Windblume" is divided into three sections: "Festive Anecdotes," "Festive Challenges," and "Peculiar Wonderland." Now let us introduce you to their contents!

ㆍFestive Anecdotes

The Festive Anecdotes are divided into four acts. Each act will unlock a new storyline quest and Residents' Commissions. Complete these quests to obtain Primogems, Character EXP Materials, Mora, and other rewards.


​


ㆍFestive Challenges

During the event, the Traveler can take part in three challenges: "Bullseye Balloons," "Floral Freefall," and "Ballads of Breeze." Complete the corresponding challenges to obtain Festive Tour Tickets and rewards from various characters.

Festive Tour Tickets can be used in the Event Shop to exchange for the Windblume Festival Commemorative Balloon, the Windsong Lyre, Talent Enhancement Materials, and other rewards.

You can choose the events you want to take part in from the Festive Challenges page.

↓


​



As the event progresses, new Festive Challenges will continue to emerge.

Follow the instructions to take part in and complete the challenge. Each time you complete these challenges, you will obtain the corresponding points.

↓


Once you have attained certain levels of points in the various challenges, you will be able to obtain the prizes that the characters have prepared for you!

Tip: You can only collect these character-prepared prizes when completing the Festive Challenges in single player mode.


Now let us explain the content of these three challenges to you all:

ㆍBullseye Balloons



During the Windblume Festival, Travelers can find Bullseye Balloons event billboards via the instructions on the event page.

Travelers will have to score consecutive hits on the correct balloons to accumulate points. Once the time is up, the challenge ends and your score shall be finalized.



Different balloons have different effects. Pick your targets carefully if you wish to get a high score.

Hitting consecutive balloons within a short time will accumulate a Combo, which will increase the amount of points gained as you continue scoring consecutive hits. If you hit a Heartbreak Balloon, your Combo will be interrupted.



Tip: During this challenge, only Normal and Charged Attacks can be used to pop the balloons (Aimed Shots are considered Charged Attacks). We recommend that you use characters who specialize in using Bows to take part in this challenge, Travelers~

ㆍFloral Freefall



During the Windblume Festival, Travelers can follow the instructions on the event page to look for Floral Freefall event billboards.

Travelers will have to leap down from a high platform and collect the Flower Balls floating in the skies. Different Flower Balls will award different amounts of points. Other than this, the amount of challenge time remaining will be converted into points. Each second is worth 1 point, and you can gain up to 10 additional points.


​


Travelers will have to leap down from a high platform and collect the Flower Balls floating in the skies. Different Flower Balls will award different amounts of points. Other than this, the amount of challenge time remaining will be converted into points. Each second is worth 1 point, and you can gain up to 10 additional points.

You will have to make wise decisions while you are collecting them if you wish to get a high score...


​


ㆍBallads of Breeze

Travelers can test their musical performance skills in "Ballads of Breeze."



Begin the challenge via the "Ballads of Breeze" event page.

After the challenge has begun, you will have to follow the rhythm of the music and the gradually shrinking Rhythm Rings to press the correct buttons at the right time.



Accurate play allows you to increase the Combo count. When your Combo count reaches a certain point, accurate play will award more points. Watch out though — a missed note will send your Combo count up in smoke...



ㆍPeculiar Wonderland

During the event, Travelers can follow the directions on their maps to find the entrance to the Peculiar Wonderland and begin that challenge. The challenges can be done in either single player or co-op mode.



Once the challenge has begun, Travelers must complete three random Peculiar Challenges and one Peculiar Trial.



Additionally, completing Peculiar Conqueror tasks will allow you to obtain Primogems, Talent Enhancement Materials, Mora, and other rewards! You can view the details of the Peculiar Conqueror tasks from the event page.



As the event progresses, each Act will have its own Peculiar Conqueror tasks. The Peculiar Trial will also change. Peculiar Trials that appeared before will not appear again.



Tip: If you fail the challenge or leave the Wonderland while it is in progress, you will be unable to obtain any Peculiar Collab Coupons, nor will you be able to complete any Peculiar Conqueror tasks. Additionally, progress on Peculiar Conqueror tasks that have not yet been unlocked will not be recorded.


〓Event Rewards〓

Travelers can exchange Festive Tour Tickets and Peculiar Collab Coupons for rewards at the Event Shop.


​




〓Notes〓

Enhancing Windblume Ode during the event will yield a Weapon Enhancement EXP Bonus.

No Original Resin is required to take part in this event.

You will only be able to unlock the next act's storyline quest in Festive Anecdotes by finishing the previous act's storyline quest.

And that's it for this round of introductions for "Invitation of Windblume"! But don't worry, we will have more Windblume news for you in the future. Have fun during the festival~

subject: A Windblume Story
content: Today, The Cat's Tail is hosting a Festive Challenge competition with the Windblume Festival-exclusive Applebloom Cider as the main prize! Without thinking twice, Venti signs up, but just when victory seems to be at his fingertips, he... fails!?
contentOriginal: Today, The Cat's Tail is hosting a Festive Challenge competition with the Windblume Festival-exclusive Applebloom Cider as the main prize! Without thinking twice, Venti signs up, but just when victory seems to be at his fingertips, he... fails!?

subject: Windblume Tips
content:
Strategy Keywords: Pick the best Flower Balls, aim for the Finish Line Garland

To get a high score in the Floral Freefall challenge, collect as many high-value Flower Balls as possible within the time limit.

So, when you are presented with several options at the same height, try to prioritize Honey-Petal Crowns above other Flower Ball types. As you start to approach the ground, keep an eye on the Finish Line Garland. Landing inside it gives you a whopping 400 points — you can't afford to miss it!



Strategy Keywords: Master the timing, remember the button sequence, build your combo

During the Ballads of Breeze challenge, Travelers need to pay attention to the Rhythm Rings and press the right buttons at the right time.

Listen to the melody and try to anticipate when Rhythm Rings will appear. When the rhythm gets faster, or when many Rhythm Rings appear in quick succession, consider memorizing the sequence in which to press the buttons to minimize errors.




Strategy Keywords: Select your target, adjust your angle, build your combo

During the Bullseye Balloons challenge, selecting an [optimal target] and [optimal angle of attack] are essential! When there's only a few balloons within your field of view, try switching to a different spot~



Building your combo will help you quickly rake in the points — but beware of Heartbreak Balloons, as hitting them will break your combo.

Hitting a Celebration Balloon will burst other balloons in proximity to it. Hit it at the most opportune moment to bag a bunch of points in one go!

Hitting a Bouquet Balloon will give you a massive number of points, so make sure to hit them when they appear!
contentOriginal:
Strategy Keywords: Pick the best Flower Balls, aim for the Finish Line Garland

To get a high score in the Floral Freefall challenge, collect as many high-value Flower Balls as possible within the time limit.

So, when you are presented with several options at the same height, try to prioritize Honey-Petal Crowns above other Flower Ball types. As you start to approach the ground, keep an eye on the Finish Line Garland. Landing inside it gives you a whopping 400 points — you can't afford to miss it!

Hitting a Bouquet Balloon will give you a massive number of points, so make sure to hit them when they appear!

subject: "Thank you, Noelle!"
content: Gorgeous spring blossoms, their bright petals bursting with gratitude... For Noelle, this is the best recognition she could ever hope for.
contentOriginal: Gorgeous spring blossoms, their bright petals bursting with gratitude... For Noelle, this is the best recognition she could ever hope for.

subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Chapter 14: Beware Kaeya's Praise
content: "Wonderful! Perfect! Breathtaking!"
contentOriginal: "Wonderful! Perfect! Breathtaking!"

subject: Windblume Tips - Issue No. 2
content:
Strategy Keywords: Dodge into the evasion zones

In "Bubble Speedster" and "The Great Bubble Crash" challenges, you can dodge the bubbles by finding the evasion zones on either side of the path. Remember to dodge into these zones when faced with an onslaught of tightly-packed bubbles.




Strategy Keywords: Sprint, jump

In "Barrage Minuet" challenges, you must avoid the projectiles shot out from the mechanism at the center of the stage as you try to survive until time runs out. Adept use of sprinting and jumping can help you avoid this barrage.



Note: Mines will randomly appear around you during the challenge. Stay in one place for too long or hang out on a Geo construct for safety, and you just might be in for a surprise from a mine!



Strategy Keywords: Take notes

In "One-Way Traffic" challenges, memorize the path that lights up — that's the correct path you need to take to reach your destination within the time limit.

Note: Pay close attention to how the path lights up, and take notes if you need to! That way, you won't get the path wrong...




Strategy Keywords: Facundity, blessings

After completing three Peculiar challenges, you can activate blessings based on how much Facundity you accumulate. Blessings boost your strength during the Peculiar Trial.



When Facundity reaches 100



When Facundity reaches 200



When Facundity reaches 300

In Co-Op challenges, each Travelers will accumulate their own Facundity. If you run into powerful enemies that are difficult to defeat, give the challenge a try with some friends~

In Co-Op challenges, each Travelers will accumulate their own Facundity. If you run into powerful enemies that are difficult to defeat, give the challenge a try with some friends~

subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Part 15: Don't Disturb Lisa When She's Resting
content: "With Cutie watching, I should put in a bit more effort, shouldn't I?"
contentOriginal: "With Cutie watching, I should put in a bit more effort, shouldn't I?"

subject: Light creates shadow, but shadow will not be controlled by light
content:
"Where did Rosaria go off to this time...? Oh, has anyone seen her? There's choir practice today. Deacon Dahlia told me I must ask her to come!" —Barbara



Rosaria

Thorny Benevolence

A Nonconforming Sister

Vision: Cryo

Constellation: Spinea Corona



A sister in Mondstadt's Church of Favonius.


At a glance, she appears to be a usual member of the clergy, but after observing her behavior, you would find she is anything but.


Her reverence for the gods is less than that of even the average citizen of Mondstadt, and she never participates in the activities of the Church.


Rosaria is an unusual loner who is a sister of the Church in name only.


But don't forget that wherever light may reach, there will also be shadow.

"Where did Rosaria go off to this time...? Oh, has anyone seen her? There's choir practice today. Deacon Dahlia told me I must ask her to come!" —Barbara

subject: "Everything is negotiable, except overtime." — "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria
content:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~

Today, let's get to know one of the sisters of Mondstadt's Church of Favonius — Rosaria!


Yes, she's a sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. She's known for her sharp, cold words and manner. This sister moves about almost like a wisp of black smoke — blink, and you'll miss her as she disappears into thin air.
contentOriginal:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~

Today, let's get to know one of the sisters of Mondstadt's Church of Favonius — Rosaria!


Yes, she's a sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. She's known for her sharp, cold words and manner. This sister moves about almost like a wisp of black smoke — blink, and you'll miss her as she disappears into thin air.

subject: New Character Demo - "Rosaria: No Overtime, Ever" | Genshin Impact
content:
"I complete my work with the utmost professionalism and effort... but when my shift is over, it's over — just in time to enjoy a glass of breakfast wine."


Few know that Rosaria, the unpredictable Sister who does her best to avoid all of the Church's activities, is in fact very reliable in her work.


But... does anyone actually know what work it is that Rosaria does?

subject: Contending Tides Event - Challenge the Arena and Win Primogems
content:
During this event, Travelers can participate in challenges at Dadaupa Gorge's Meaty Arena and earn Primogems and other rewards by completing challenges at various difficulties.


〓Event Duration〓

2021/04/02 10:00:00 – 2021/04/12 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Details〓

● Starting from the first day of this event, a new challenge with three difficulty levels will unlock every day. Travelers can select the difficulty at which to attempt a challenge. Completing a challenge at a higher difficulty will also automatically clear any lower difficulties.

● Each challenge has up to three completion criteria. All criteria must be fulfilled to complete the challenge.

● Each challenge will enhance certain abilities. Pay attention to the bonus effects and use them to maximize your advantage.

● Changing your World Level will not affect the difficulty of event challenges.

subject: "Tales From the Snow Mountain" - Genshin Impact Dragonspine OST Feature Video
content: In the Shanghai Symphony Hall, 12 musicians play on string instruments, music producer Yu-Peng Chen performs on the piano, and a chorus of 21 children sings in harmony. Together they bring the featured song of the Genshin Impact Dragonspine OST — "Tales From the Snow Mountain." — to life.
contentOriginal: In the Shanghai Symphony Hall, 12 musicians play on string instruments, music producer Yu-Peng Chen performs on the piano, and a chorus of 21 children sings in harmony. Together they bring the featured song of the Genshin Impact Dragonspine OST — "Tales From the Snow Mountain." — to life.

subject: Genshin Impact - May Your Journey Know No Bounds | PlayStation®5 Announcement Trailer
content:
May the songs of Windblume lift your wings high and free,

May the ancient stone shape your shield sturdy and strong,

May the icy winds of Dragonspine test your bravery,

May the daunting enemies you face... uh... spur your growth along?


Traveler, let's go on an adventure!


The PlayStation®5 version of Genshin Impact is coming soon. Stay tuned!
